title: Hour 1: Sinusitis
description:
Rihanna's got the Super Bowl halftime gig and Billy is excited...about a Lee Greenwood rabbit hole he fell into. We open up some quarterback windows and Trevor Lawrence's career rising to new heights now that Urban Meyer is gone. Plus, we get into how the media handled the Ime Udoka suspension.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
